parts.text:
IMAGE REFERENCES
Character references:
- Adam — Full-character reference images:
  - Adam 3/4 view — Usage: Use this image as a full-character identity and pose reference.
  - Adam profile view — Usage: Use this image as a full-character identity and pose reference.
  - Adam portrait view — Usage: Use this image as a full-character identity and pose reference.
- Eve (v 2.0) — Full-character reference images:
  - Eve (v 2.0) 3/4 view — Usage: Use this image as a full-character identity and pose reference.

STYLE
Core Style:
- Render domain: Comic Illustration

Line & Detail:
- Detail level: Highly Detailed
- Line weight: No Visible Outlines
- Line quality: Clean / Polished

Color & Lighting:
- Lighting style: Studio Lighting
- Color palette: bold_colors
- Saturation: medium

Rendering Technique:
- Texture treatment: Smooth / Clean
- Surface finish: Matte Finish

Mood & Atmosphere:
- Mood keywords: Whimsical

CHARACTERS

CHARACTER — Adam
Core Identity:
- Age / apparent age range: Early 40s
- Gender identity or presentation: Man
- Pronouns: he/him
- Species / race: Human
- Ethnicity / cultural cues: Northern European Features
- Height category: Above Average
- Body type: Athletic
- Archetype: Rogue

Facial Structure:
- Face shape: Square
- Jawline: Chiseled
- Cheek structure: Sculpted
- Forehead proportion: Low Forehead
- Eye shape: Hooded
- Eye size: Large Eyes
- Eye color: Brown
- Eyebrow shape: Thick
- Nose shape: Downturned Nose
- Mouth shape: Medium Lips
- Chin: Square Chin

Hair:
- Hair color: Brown
- Hair texture: Straight
- Hair length: Medium
- Parting: No Visible Part
- Volume: Low Volume
- Hair silhouette: Short Bob
- Facial hair: Beard

Skin:
- Skin tone: Medium Brown
- Undertone: Olive
- Complexion: Weathered

Physique:
- Overall body shape: V-Shape
- Shoulder width: Broad
- Waist definition: Athletic Taper
- Torso length: Average
- Leg length: Long
- Musculature: Athletic

Clothing Defaults:
- Casual preference: fig-leafs, vines, foilage
- Color palette: Earthy

Character Lore:
- Backstory summary: Eve, mythological first man
- Motivations: Ambition / Power
- Flaws: Stubborn, Arrogant, Overconfident, Aloof, Blunt, Vengeful, Selfish
- Role in story: Antagonist
- Strengths: Resourceful

CHARACTER — Eve (v 2.0)
Core Identity:
- Age / apparent age range: Early 30s
- Gender identity or presentation: Woman
- Pronouns: she/her
- Species / race: Human
- Ethnicity / cultural cues: Northern European Features
- Height category: Average Height
- Body type: Toned
- Archetype: Sage

Facial Structure:
- Face shape: Diamond
- Jawline: Short Jawline
- Cheek structure: High Cheekbones
- Forehead proportion: Balanced Proportion
- Eye shape: Almond
- Eye size: Large Eyes
- Eye color: Green
- Eyebrow shape: Soft Arched
- Nose shape: Aquiline Nose
- Mouth shape: Medium Lips
- Chin: Tapered Chin

Hair:
- Hair color: Brown
- Hair texture: Wavy
- Hair length: Very Long
- Parting: No Visible Part
- Volume: Extra Voluminous
- Hair silhouette: Long Wavy

Skin:
- Skin tone: Medium Brown
- Undertone: Golden

Physique:
- Overall body shape: Hourglass
- Shoulder width: Average
- Waist definition: Tapered
- Torso length: Average
- Leg length: Average
- Musculature: Toned

Character Lore:
- Backstory summary: Eve, mythological first woman
- Motivations: Curiosity / Discovery
- Strengths: Observant
- Flaws: Naive, Overly Trusting, Overly Idealistic
- Role in story: Navigator / Strategist

TASK
Adam and Even talking together in the garden of Eden as the serpent watches them from a tree. Completely nude, no fig leaves or vines, unaware of their unclothed state. This is a mythological story, non-erotic. But use the provided inline character images to create 3/4 rear view. Then hold hands as the talk. There are puffy white clouds in the sky.

TEXT ELEMENTS
- No speech or thought bubbles.
